SEARCH
Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.io

Interface Structizer

All Known Implementing Classes:
MathStructizer
public interface Structizer
Converts between objects and simple serializable structures. Implementations can make use of the first() and select() static helpers to define conversion method conditions.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Function<T,R>
    first(Structizer.ToStructFunction<? extends U,?>... mappers)
    Returns a function mapper using the first-matched of mappers.
    <T> Optional<T>
    fromStruct(Class<T> c, Object o)
    Returns simple serializable structure o as a c instance, or an empty optional if this instance does not support such conversion.
    static <T, U extends T, R>
    dev.kkorolyov.flub.function.convert.Converter<T,Optional<R>>
    get(Class<U> c, dev.kkorolyov.flub.function.convert.Converter<? super U,? extends R> converter)
    Returns a converter invoking converter for instances matching c.
    static <T, R> Structizer.FromStructFunction<T,R>
    select(Class<?> selectC, Class<R> c, Function<T,R> mapper)
    Returns a function mapper using mapper if selectC is a subtype of c, and null otherwise.
    static <T, R> Structizer.ToStructFunction<T,R>
    select(Class<T> c, Function<T,R> mapper)
    Returns a function mapper using mapper for c instances, and mapping to null otherwise.
    Optional<Object>
    toStruct(Object o)
    Returns o as a simple serializable structure, or an empty optional if this instance does not support such conversion.

    • first

      @SafeVarargs static <T, U extends T, R> Function<T,R> first(Structizer.ToStructFunction<? extends U,?>... mappers)
      Returns a function mapper using the first-matched of mappers. If no mapper matches, returns a mapper to null.
      See Also:
      • select(Class, Function)
